meanings.definition: The property of certain crystals to generate an electric charge when heated or cooled.
meanings.sent1: Pyroelectricity in crystals creates electricity when they get hot or cold.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study pyroelectricity in crystals to understand how they produce electric charges.
meanings.sent3: The crystal's pyroelectricity was so strong that it powered a tiny light bulb just by changing temperature.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like pyroelectricity, sparking and spreading through the room.
meanings.sent5: The demonstration of pyroelectricity was like magic, as the crystal lit up without any wires.

meanings.definition: The phenomenon of electric polarization in a material due to changes in temperature.
meanings.sent1: Pyroelectricity can cause materials to become polarized when the temperature changes.
meanings.sent2: The researchers observed pyroelectricity in the material as it reacted to temperature fluctuations.
meanings.sent3: The pyroelectricity in the fabric made the jacket feel warmer as the weather got colder.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was like pyroelectricity, building up with every degree drop in temperature.
meanings.sent5: The artist used pyroelectricity as inspiration, creating a sculpture that seemed to change with the weather.
